original_text: At daybreak the woman went back to the house where her master was staying, fell down at the door and lay there until daylight.
korean_text: 동틀 때에 여인이 자기의 주인이 있는 그 사람의 집 문에 이르러 엎드러져 밝기까지 거기 엎드러져 있더라

sentences.original_text: At daybreak the woman went back
to the house where her master was staying

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 날이 밝을 때까지 그곳에 누워 있었습니다
